See also: brötchen

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Brot (“bread”) +‎ -chen (“diminutive”)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈbʁøːtçən/
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Brötchen n (genitive Brötchens, plural Brötchen)

  1. a bun, bread roll
    Synonyms: Schrippe, Semmel, Weck

Declension[edit]
